editor_palette_item.body:
<g id="checkbox_online" transform="translate(%%COORDINATE_X%%,%%COORDINATE_Y%%)" > <!-- Metadata information. Please don't edit. --> <text display="none">type=checkbox</text>
<rect x="0" y="0" rx="5" ry="5" width="200" height="30" fill="none" stroke="rgb(255,165,0)" stroke-width="2" visibility="hidden"> <set attributeName="visibility" attributeType="XML" begin="checkbox_online.focusin" fill="freeze" to="visible"/> <set attributeName="visibility" attributeType="XML" begin="checkbox_online.focusout" fill="freeze" to="hidden"/> </rect> <rect x="7.4" y="5" width="20" height="20" fill="white" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/> <path transform="translate(12.5,15.5)" d="M 0,0 5,5 5,-12" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"> <!-- Metadata information. Please don't edit. --> <text display="none">type=mark</text> </path> <text x="33.8" y="21.6" stroke="gray" font-size="15"> <!-- Metadata information. Please don't edit. --> <text display="none">type=text</text> Online</text> </g>
